description: Get the lost push messages that were not within 3 days of the current time and not confirmed to have been consumed

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID in assigned user registration is successful, required for all requests

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Format: in Eulixspace

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

parameters.name: error
parameters.description: Indicates error type if/it error. Empty if no error occurred

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Indicates error details if/it error. Empty if no error happened

parameters.name: warning
parameters.description: Indicates warning details if/it warning. Empty if no warning happened

parameters.name: push_message_list
parameters.description: Returns the pushed OSS get push messages list once lost within 3 days of the current time

children.name: chop_id
children.description: Request's unique identifier for a chop

children.name: timestamp
children.description: Timestamp that indicates the message sent date

parameters.name: last_chop_page
parameters.description: This is to indicate if there are more push messages to be consumed in more than 100. If 0 indicate in one day need to confirm the messages to be consumed

parameters.name: last_message_id
parameters.description: Specifies the end entry of data returned in the current call
